title: Installation issue: wireshark did not set rpath correctly
body:
I needed to add `-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH=ON` to the wireshark/package.py to get RPATHs set correctly. It did find some libraries, but maybe those were from indirect depends?
